```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(terra)
library(spData)
```

```{r}
nz_height <- nz_height
grain <- terra::rast(system.file("raster/grain.tif", package = "spData"))
```


```{r}
# Check units of elevation
st_crs(nz_height)$units


# Filter for elevation points greater than 3100
nz_high <- nz_height %>% 
  filter(elevation > 3100)
```

```{r}
# Make a template raster 
nz_rast <- rast(ext(nz_high), 
                resolution=3000, 
                crs = crs(nz_high))
```
